alert.note: Alert for Garden; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grant and northeastern Garden Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Ashby, or 30 miles northwest of Arthur. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Swede Lake and Dominick Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
